cgcloud__Promotion_Reward_Group__c.name: cgcloud__Promotion_Reward_Group__c
cgcloud__Promotion_Reward_Group__c.description: This object holds the details of the reward group that's assigned to a promotion.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Count_Hurdles__c.description: Count of promotion hurdles with Reward Group-Specific Record Type.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Included__c.description: Define whether the reward group is to be considered on pricing calculations in context of selectable promotion.

cgcloud__Promotion__c.description: Lookup to the promotion to which the Reward Group is linked.

cgcloud__Reward_Multiplicity__c.description: Defines the number of rewards that can be selected in mobility if conditions are fulfilled.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the promotion reward group belongs.

cgcloud__Sort_Unique__c.description: Defines the uniqueness of the sort value.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sort order of the displayable reward groups records.

cgcloud__Title__c.description: Localizable title of the Reward Group. Reference to the title based on the user-specifiied language.
